version_description:
* iPhone5 updates
* Retina updates
* iOS7 updates
* bug fixing

Please leave us a review & stay tuned about tricount : http://www.facebook.com/tricount
Fixes iOS8 related issue - please upgrade

-> improved stability and usability
-> Added support for Spanish
-> Fixed localisation issues for Swiss-German users

• Technical overhaul
• New design
• Easier sharing & syncing
• Add settlements/ reimbursements to balance your debts
• Add your email to automatically receive your tricount's link
• Soft identification to clarify your share of the expenses
• Correction of several minor bugs

• Technical overhaul
• New design
• Easier sharing & syncing
• Add settlements/ reimbursements to balance your debts
• Add your email to automatically receive your tricount's link
• Soft identification to clarify your share of the expenses
• Correction of several minor bugs

• 2.0.0 bug fix: under rare circumstances, some tricounts were not properly migrated form old versions. This version fixes the issue and recovers the problematic tricounts.

• Technical overhaul
• New design
• Easier sharing & syncing
• Add settlements/ reimbursements to balance your debts
• Add your email to automatically receive your tricount's link
• Soft identification to clarify your share of the expenses
• Correction of several minor bugs

• 2.0.0 bug fix: under rare circumstances, some tricounts were not properly migrated form old versions. This version fixes the issue and recovers the problematic tricounts.

• Technical overhaul
• New design
• Easier sharing & syncing
• Add settlements/ reimbursements to balance your debts
• Add your email to automatically receive your tricount's link
• Soft identification to clarify your share of the expenses
• Correction of several minor bugs

• 2.0.0 bug fix: under rare circumstances, some tricounts were not properly migrated form old versions. This version fixes the issue and recovers the problematic tricounts.

• improved support of PL, PT and DE translations
• now correctly handles network connections on iOS 8.x
• minor bugfixes

• improved support of PL, PT and DE translations
• now correctly handles network connections on iOS 8.x
• minor bugfixes

• improved support of PL, PT and DE translations
• now correctly handles network connections on iOS 8.x
• minor bugfixes

- improved iOS 11 support !
- premium features are better explained
- minor bugfixes

As always, make sure to sync your tricounts before upgrading.
This release improves the app stability.

• Improvement of the payment options at the end of a tricount
• Synchronisation optimisation (faster synchronisation for users outside of Europe)
• New: Personalised payment invitations at the end of a tricount
• Improved support for iOS 11

• It is now possible to sort the expenses
• Clarification of the payment options at the end of your tricount
• Some minor bugfixes
• Improved iPhone X support

Thanks to your feedback, in this release we have :

- added a new sort option: you can now sort by "payer"
- added a "personal mode" that will display only the expenses you are involved in
- made the share of a tricount easier
- fixed some little bugs

Thanks to your feedback, in this release we have :

- added a new sort option: you can now sort by "payer"
- added a "personal mode" that will display only the expenses you are involved in
- made the share of a tricount easier
- fixed some little bugs

Thanks to your feedback, in this release we have :

- added a new sort option: you can now sort by "payer"
- added a "personal mode" that will display only the expenses you are involved in
- made the share of a tricount easier
- fixed some little bugs

• Log in with your email / Facebook / Google:
> to get NOTIFICATIONS when your friends add or edit expenses
> to see all your tricounts linked to your profile
> to have a seamless experience when using several devices

• We reorganised the menus in the app
• The dates are now visible in the list of the transactions
• It is now easier to delete a tricount from your device

• clarification of the repayment methods at the end of a tricount
• minor improvements to the UX
• stabilisation of the app
• grouped notifications in iOS 12

• Add up to 3 images to your expenses. It’s ideal for sharing the receipts or for remembering happy moments shared together
• French users can now use Lyf Pay to repay each other
• Updates to Frequently Asked Questions
• Minor corrections and small improvements

• Add up to 3 images to your expenses. It’s ideal for sharing the receipts or for remembering happy moments shared together
• French users can now use Lyf Pay to repay each other
• Updates to Frequently Asked Questions
• Minor corrections and small improvements

• Receive tricount invites directly in the app if you are logged in
• Amount and currency format improved: It's based on your language and region now!
• Choose from over 150 official currencies at the tricount creation
• Simpler payment screens
• Improvements linked to the offline usage

• Receive tricount invites directly in the app if you are logged in
• Amount and currency format improved: It's based on your language and region now!
• Choose from over 150 official currencies at the tricount creation
• Simpler payment screens
• Improvements linked to the offline usage

• Improved the Tricount creation process
• Improved offline app behaviour
• Premium features access made clearer (premium users: check your gold crown!)
• Improved support for the X/Xs/Xr/Xs Max devices
• Other minor improvements & bug fixes

• Improved tricount invitations with phone number
• Auto Synchro of new expenses is finally there!
• Increased login visibility
• Other minor improvements and bugfixes

• Activate Premium for all participants in the same tricount
• Simplification of the tricount creation process
• Minor improvements and fixes

Did you know that in this version, you can also:
• Get notified whenever your friends add, edit or delete a shared expense
• Add images to your expenses (save receipts or remember happy moments)

€, $, £, ... Use several currencies in the same tricount!
Take advantage of the market rate or specify your own to be used

Did you know that in this version, you can also:
• Get notified whenever your friends add, edit or delete a shared expense
• Add images to your expenses (save receipts or remember happy moments)

• Clarification of the in-app purchases
• Display improvement for certain currencies
• Better iPad support
• Minor corrections


DID YOU KNOW that in this version, you can also:
• €, $, £, ... use multiple currencies in a same tricount
• Add pictures to each expense (of the bill, of a good memory)

• Next to expenses, it's possible to enter income (deposits, guarantee, cashback)
• You can enter longer expense titles
• Other improvements and bug fixes

DID YOU KNOW that in this version, you can also:
• €, $, £, ... use multiple currencies in a same tricount
• Add pictures to each expense (of the bill, of a good memory)

• Added new screen for existing transactions. Details like title, amount, images and distribution among participant are in the center now. You can also easily switch between transactions.
• Added tricount categories
• Improved automatic synchronisation of expenses
• Other improvements and bug fixes

DID YOU KNOW that in this version, you can also: 
•  €, $, £, ... use multiple currencies in a same tricount
• Add pictures to each expense (of the bill, of a good memory)
• Take incomes into consideration (deposits, guarantee, cashback)

• "Sign In with Apple" : you can now log in using your Apple ID
• iOS13.2 : improved support
• Invite your friends to a tricount right after the creation of a tricount
• Other improvements and bug fixes

• "Sign In with Apple" : you can now log in using your Apple ID
• iOS13.2 : improved support
• Invite your friends to a tricount right after the creation of a tricount
• Other improvements and bug fixes
• Fixes an issue at tricount creation on iOS <= 10.x

• "Sign In with Apple": you can now log in using your Apple ID
• iOS 13.2: improved support
• Invite your friends to a tricount right after the creation of a tricount
• Other improvements and bug fixes
• Fixes an issue at tricount creation on iOS <= 10.x

• Improved look and feel of expense images
• Other improvements and bug fixes

DID YOU KNOW that in this version, you can also:
• €, $, £, ... use multiple currencies
• Add pictures to each expense (of the bill, of a good memory)
• Take incomes into consideration (deposits, guarantee, cashback)

• Enter your IBAN directly in the app! Friends will see it if they owe you money
• Added a tricount export functionality (PDF and CSV) for the identified users
• Hold your thumb on our app icon - You can quickly add expenses via the new shortcut with Haptic Touch
• Improved readability of long participant names
• Other improvements and bug fixes

• Add pictures to each expense (of the bill, of a good memory)
• Take incomes into consideration (deposits, guarantee, cashback)

• Welcome dark mode
• Dynamic sorting of your tricounts depending on the activity
• Reorganised reimbursement section with a better personal view. Check the new balances screen!
• Manage all your expenses with up to 50 participants
• Other improvements and bug fixes

• Sort & group expenses per category to better understand the costs
• Use the CSV export to further analyse your categorised expenses

• Summary of your categories visualised with a pie chart in the new statistics screen
• Updated PDF export design
• Stability improvements and library maintenance
